column2:
"<%me>!
I wanted to see you again!"

"<%me>, listen!
Sir Saga has been terrible with me!"
"Putting me through such intense training without any rest, my body has been pushed to its limit."
"...Yet you do have the stamina to go running to greet <%me>."
"That was but a sudden burst. Aah, my body's starting to feel fragile again..."
"Enough. You are annoying <%me>."
"So harsh! Unemotional as usual!"
"Aah~ If only I could be partnered up with you instead of Saga."
"...I understand. If that's how you feel, it can't be helped. Would you rather try it that way?"
"I've reached the limits of what I can teach, I'm afraid."
"I'll take care of the paperwork. Your training will remain the same, but you will have a new partner."

"Ah? N-no...
Sir Saga? What are you..."

"<%me>, my apologies.
From now on, you'll have to take care of her. I'm counting on you."
"Ho-hold on! Wait! Sir Saga, I was jesting! A joke! I'm sure you understand!"
"...Don't overstrain yourself, Katori. After all our training, your body's in a lot of pain, isn't it?"
"I see now that I've been putting you through too much. Forgive me."
"Such kind words! But how?! They feel like an arrow piercing through my chest!"
"No, this is wrong! I can do it! I can keep going! Actually, I haven't done enough yet!"
"...Does that mean you still want me to train you?"
"But of course!"
"Even if you feel like you're dying? Even after your body starts crying, you'll keep going?"
"I'm completely prepared!"
"You don't really mean those words."
"I certainly do!"
"I see..."
"Then I won't hold back. Our training thus far has only been a warm up. The real thing starts now."
"With our next training, I'll test your new resolve!"
"I have already prepared it. Come on, let's go."
"...Excuse me? Already prepared, you say?"
"B-but, hold on, Sir Saga. Shouldn't we start taking it easy...?"
"I knew you didn't mean those words."
"H-hey... I was just swept along in the flow of the conversation... b-but...!"
